alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:34PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA AND WESTERN BENNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM MDT... At 434 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Wakpamni, or 17 miles southwest of Martin, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Martin, LaCreek North Housing and Sunrise Housing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
